text: Djilali Abdi (25 November 1943 – 2 February 2022) was an Algerian footballer. He played as a midfielder. He made six appearances for the Algeria national team from 1967 to 1969. He was born in Sidi Bel Abbès, French Algeria, France. He also played for USM Bel Abbès. Abdi died on 2 February 2022 at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Algerian footballers
title: Djilali Abdi
